A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Not 100% sure about the logic of "moving forward" on one of the most beloved franchises in movie history by not only erasing all of the triumphs of the original movies but also seeming to go out of the way to demean and denigrate it's heroes and specifically alienate the fanbase that kept it going for 40 years.

This wasn't Star Wars: it was an insulting dismantling of it. In abandoning the mythology and morality of the franchise (while continually urging us to burn the past\, no less!) the Disney franchise is nothing more or less than an imposter\, an expensive knock off.

You could literally fed the cast alphabet soup and had them defecate a better story than what Disney delivered here.
